channel.title: I downloaded the easy rsc v 1.1 now what?
channel.description: I got the easy rsc v 1.1 but when i run the sever and the client it says unable to connect what can i do to be able to play i just wanna make it private i am not going to put it up for others to use only for me so how i do it?

item.title: I downloaded the easy rsc v 1.1 now what?
item.dc:creator: @Artemis_Wp Artemis Wp
item.description:
@Artemis_Wp wrote:

[quote=“Chivava, post:6, topic:450339”][quote author=Artemis Wp link=topic=553232.msg4058419#msg4058419 date=1343220162]

Well I just downloaded Easy RSC as well, and i’ve tried and editing these variables, yet my CMD Prompt, closes immediatly with some error messages, when im trying to run the server, i have Ant and JDK 7 installed.

Try use JDK 6 u33 instead JDK 7
[/quote]
Allright, i’ll try that out instead.

Edit: I just tried it out, edited the enviorment variables, even tried using the one that Lin made, also i got Ant installed.[/quote]

I suggest u to use NOOBScape v3 … that use own ant and it`s more easy for beginners.
Contact me via MSN and i will send u source.

Read full topic

Allright, i’ll try that out instead.

Edit: I just tried it out, edited the enviorment variables, even tried using the one that Lin made, also i got Ant installed.

item.title: I downloaded the easy rsc v 1.1 now what?
item.dc:creator: @Artemis_Wp Artemis Wp
item.description:
@Artemis_Wp wrote:

Unable to connect? U need to set running IP adress (in this case : localhost) … search for those files : Settings.ini and Server.java

Server.java - search for this acceptor.bind(new InetSocketAddress after InetSocketAdress u will see ("…", GameVars.portNumber) - replace … with LOCALHOST. Save and compile.

Settings.ini - change first line to this server=localhost

Read full topic

go under the settings of the client and for ip put localhost
